headline: Should Darden Restaurants' (DRI) Lowered EPS Guidance Shift Investors' Focus on Long-Term Profitability?
summary: Earlier this week, Darden Restaurants reported quarterly revenues in line with forecasts but fell short of analysts' EBITDA estimates and revised its full-year EPS guidance downward. Despite a strong start to the fiscal year and initial growth in same-restaurant sales, recent results reflect some pressure facing both the company and the broader sit-down dining sector. Now, we’ll explore how Darden’s caution on full-year earnings forecasts may influence its longer-term investment...
